title: How to Draw a Little Girl

steps.title: Draw a circle.
steps.content: Draw a circle. Add curved line below for the jaw. Sketch a crossed line to indicate the center of the face.

steps.title: Draw the torso and the hips.
steps.content: Draw the torso and the hips.

steps.title: Draw the hands.
steps.content: Draw the hands. Position it flexed as if holding a book.

steps.title: Draw the legs in crossed sitting position.
steps.content: Draw the legs in crossed sitting position.

steps.title: Now draw the details on the face looking below.
steps.content: Now draw the details on the face looking below. Adjust to looks if you want to add a friends face.

steps.title: Draw desired hair style and the outline of the face.
steps.content: Draw desired hair style and the outline of the face.

steps.title: Draw the T-shirt and the book.
steps.content: Draw the T-shirt and the book.

steps.title: Draw details to the hands and the legs.
steps.content: Draw details to the hands and the legs.

steps.title: Draw a circle.
steps.content: Draw a circle. Add curved line below for the jaw. Sketch a crossed line to indicate the center of the face.

steps.title: Draw the neck, torso and the hips.
steps.content: Draw the neck, torso and the hips.

steps.title: Draw the arms and the legs taking note of the location of the joints.
steps.content: Draw the arms and the legs taking note of the location of the joints.

steps.title: Draw the girl's face with a smile.
steps.content: Draw the girl's face with a smile.

steps.title: Add details such as dress and shoes.
